entry.title: Until You Name Me, You Can't Tame Me
entry.summary:
Author: Ich0ras

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 862Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Jason's back from the dead, has been from some time. But has never found it in him to reveal his return to the Bat's and Bird's. Instead, he's become their #1 pain in the ass, and boy does it just keep becoming a bigger and bigger issue for Bruce. (he can't even figure out why. until he does)

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 112,712Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 241

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: Inheritance of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: Pistolbag

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 96,249Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 179

Summary: In Gotham’s grim streets, there’s always a new face: an old ghost in a new skin. But when a young girl, feral and untrained, is discovered in a dark corner of Gotham's underground by Batman and Robin during a mission to stop David Cain, the dynamic of the Bat-Family is forever changed.

entry.title: Little B
entry.summary:
Author: Erilia_31

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,029Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 330

Summary: Bruce Wayne gets turned into his twelve years old self.I don't know what other scenarios/interactions to write for this, so I only have one chapter, but I'll make more if I think of more. Or feel free to comment ideas and I can maybe write it.I've watched Gotham before, but it was a long while ago. I'm rewatching it, but I'm only in the first few episodes, so I might get things wrong. This probably won't be very Canon to anything, but I'll try. Feel free to leave advice.

entry.title: At the end of your fall,
entry.summary:
Author: ArtyPuppet

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,125Chapters: 3/8Kudos: 205

Summary: “He didn't look like your typical upstart vigilante though, most obviously because the young man's face wasn't covered. But there were other things too, no extra colours or logos, he was all black, the only real oddity was that he was missing a shoulder guard. Perhaps it was more odd that it's his only piece of armour. The whole thing seemed, manufactured somehow, like a uniform. His outfit would be best described as practical but that still felt wrong. Batman knew practical, he knew efficient, he knew function, just ask his utility belt, but he still had ears on his cowl. Batman was a symbol. This man was nothing.Although, Bruce was looking at the man after his sword had been confiscated by Cassandra. He surely cut quite the imposing figure when he was wielding that monster.”

entry.title: Why Can't Anything Be Simple?
entry.summary:
Author: Megamagic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,430Chapters: 19/20Kudos: 674

Summary: Green Lantern and Batman are sent to another planet to try to stop a war that would consume a vast part of the galaxy.However in the middle of the mission the planet is attacked by a power hungry species who thrive on war. To protect the lives of everyone on the planet Batman surrenders himself to the leader of the species. Who is fascinated by making the man his pet. The Justice League rush to rescue their teammate but are met with many road blocks along the way.

entry.title: Hal Jordan and the woe of having situational awareness
entry.summary:
Author: aineran

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,568Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 115

Summary: Hal Jordan is smart, more than he acts like. He also has situational awareness despite some's (cough Batman's cough) disbelief. Batman is broody, paranoid asshole. Nightwing is an angel sent from above and Red Hood is an infamous crime lord. There's Robin, Red Robin, Black Bat and all the Gotham vigilantes who are supposedly unrelated... so why does Hal keep on catching small gestures that indicate otherwise? Hal is unsure and confused about his whole situation. Batman is being grumpy and the kids... they're fine, right? And Hal's fine too, right? Batman wouldn't make him conveniently disappear, would he?

entry.title: Red Rover, Red Rover, Send Robin on Over
entry.summary:
Author: CaptainBrookeworm

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,636Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 462

Summary: “I will drive,” Damian announces. “No.” Jason grabs him by the scruff of his robes before he can squirm away. “Tim’s driving.” Damian whirls, eyes bright. “I am perfectly capable-” “Yes, Damian, you are, but you’re also too short to reach the pedals.”Jason’s honestly surprised he doesn’t get a knife in the gut for that. Tim is wise enough to keep his mouth shut. Wise - Jason decides firmly - but also breathtakingly stupid, because he takes two steps away from the truck and almost falls flat on his face when his injured leg gives out.Jason catches him, right in time for him to say, “Right. Stab wound. Forgot about that.” Jason sighs, casts his gaze to the sky, and mentally apologizes to Bruce. He’s herding cats here. He and Dick weren’t this bad, were they? (They were, he knows they were, which just makes this whole fiasco even more annoying.) - OR: Damian, Jason, and Tim meet as prisoners of the League of Assassins and make that everyone else’s problem

entry.title: Just A Totally Normal Average Human Family
entry.summary:
Author: concur

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,411Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 57

Summary: “Hello! I am Thor Odinson, a human person who hails from this planet. I like normal activities like sportsball and eating.” Thor grinned with far too many teeth. Tim and Duke stared back blankly. “I am Loki.” The slender figure behind spoke tiredly. “… Nice to meet you.” Duke eventually managed. —-OR Loki, Thor and their parents get dropped in Gotham. They decide to blend in and pass themselves off as average mortals. It goes exactly how you’d expect.

entry.title: The Grayson Effect
entry.summary:
Author: pansley

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,455Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 163

Summary: With Jason gone, Batman and Robin are stretched too thin. New villains seem to be arriving — or returning — almost every day. Gotham is left in a constant state of restoration. And the truce between Bruce and his two eldest sons is tenuous at best, and dangerously volatile at worst. It would be the absolute worst time for his youngest to be abducted. Or: Dick finds himself at the mercy of the older brother he didn’t know he had. Saving himself might just mean saving Damian, too.

entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,580Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 497

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.
